attr.q: Prove that $`f`$ is not continuous using the method of Example 5.1.6.

attr.a: The closed set $`f^{-1}`$ is $`(0, \infin)`$ which is open. Hence not continuous.
attr.q: Find $`f^{-1}\{1\}`$ and, using Proposition 5v1v9, deduce that $`f`$ is not continuous.
